name: 5ire (nanbingxyz)
description: [项目级] 5ire is a cross-platform desktop AI assistant, MCP client. It compatible with major service providers,  supports local knowledge base and  tools via model context protocol servers .。来源: https://github.com/nanbingxyz/5ire

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
5ire is a cross-platform desktop AI assistant, MCP client. It compatible with major service providers,  supports local knowledge base and  tools via model context protocol servers .

来源: https://github.com/nanbingxyz/5ire
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 5029

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: - Python - Node.js - uv (Python package manager) These components are required as they constitute the runtime environment for the MCP Server. If you don't anticipate using the tools feature immediately, you may choose to skip this installation step and complete it later when the need arises. For detailed installation instructions, please see our [Installation Guide](INSTALLATION.md).

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
DEVELOPMENT.md
INSTALLATION.md
LICENSE
README.md
biome.json
build
build/dockicon.png
build/entitlements.mac.inherit.plist
build/entitlements.mac.plist
build/icon.icns
build/icon.ico
build/icon.png
build/icons
build/installer.nsh
build/release-notes.md
docs
docs/ARCHITECTURE.md
drizzle.config.ts
drizzle

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
By keeping track of your API usage and spending, you can gain a better understanding of how much you're spending on the API and make informed decisions to optimize your use of the service.

![Usage Analytics Screenshot](https://5ire.app/analytics.png)

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content: - Python - Node.js - uv (Python package manager) These components are required as they constitute the runtime environment for the MCP Server. If you don't anticipate using the tools feature immediately, you may choose to skip this installation step and complete it later when the need arises. For detailed installation instructions, please see our [Installation Guide](INSTALLATION.md).
